episodes.description: Promoting Japanese Tea and Fishery Products to the World: This program features two projects that have been launched to deliver high quality Japanese food products to the US and Latvia.
episodes.subtitle: Promoting Japanese Tea and Fishery Products to the World
episodes.title: ESPRIT JAPON

episodes.description: Promoting Tohoku Ingredients in Thailand through "Bento"-Documents Katsuta Takahito's challenge in creating a special bento using ingredients from Tohoku, a region still largely unknown in Thailand.
episodes.subtitle: Promoting Tohoku Ingredients in Thailand through "Bento"
episodes.title: ESPRIT JAPON
